items.title: What History Tells Us to Expect From Trump’s Escalation in Los Angeles Protests
items.description: Since the 1960s, studies have shown that heavy-handed policing and militarized responses tend to make protests more volatile — not less.

items.title: From New York to Arizona, More States Consider Curbing Drug Testing at Childbirth
items.description: Some bills followed an investigation by The Marshall Project and Reveal that exposed the harms of widespread drug testing of pregnant patients.

items.title: How AI-Powered Police Forces Watch Your Every Move
items.description: Artificial intelligence is changing how police investigate crimes — and monitor citizens — as regulators struggle to keep pace.

items.title: This Mix of Therapies Is Helping to Stop Youth Violence in Chicago
items.description: A violence prevention program is pairing cognitive behavioral therapy with other support to keep high-risk teens out of jail.

items.title: Judge Stops Federal Prisons From Enforcing Trump’s Trans Care Ban, For Now
items.description: The district judge ordered the prison system to continue providing hormone therapy to transgender people as needed, while a lawsuit proceeds.
